please_connect_first: Please connect to a datasource first
descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe the purpose of this query...
drag_to_reorder: Drag to reorder, check to show columns
default_filename_hint: Leave empty to use default filename: {{filename}}
tsv_description: Tab-separated values file, suitable for data with commas
json_description: JavaScript Object Notation, suitable for programming
markdown_description: Markdown table format, suitable for documentation
sql_description: SQL INSERT statements, can be executed directly

time_range.filter_description: All queries will apply this filter after selection
time_range.custom_dialog_description: Select the time range for querying data. The system will automatically convert it to InfluxQL time expressions.
time_range.error_select_time: Please select start time and end time
time_range.error_time_order: Start time must be earlier than end time
time_range.success_set: Custom time range has been set

execution_plan_tab.no_data_hint: Please use EXPLAIN statement to view query execution plan
execution_plan_tab.suggestion_add_index: Query cost is high, consider adding indexes
execution_plan_tab.suggestion_optimize_where: Consider optimizing WHERE conditions to reduce scanned rows
execution_plan_tab.suggestion_partition: Consider using partitioned tables or materialized views

status_card.delete_no_row_count_info: InfluxDB does not return the exact number of deleted rows, this is normal database behavior
status_card.delete_where_condition_tags_only: DELETE WHERE conditions can only use tags and time
status_card.delete_cannot_use_fields: Cannot use fields in WHERE conditions
status_card.delete_check_where_condition: If data was not deleted, check if WHERE condition used a field
status_card.delete_show_tag_keys_hint: Use SHOW TAG KEYS to see which columns are tags

query_history_desc: View and manage your query history and saved queries
confirm_clear_history: Are you sure you want to clear all history records? This action cannot be undone.

performanceSlow.title: Slow Query Performance
performanceSlow.description: Query took {{seconds}} seconds. Consider adding time range limits, using indexes, or optimizing query conditions to improve performance.

performanceOptimizable.title: Query Performance Can Be Optimized
performanceOptimizable.description: Query took {{seconds}} seconds. Performance is acceptable but there's still room for optimization.

performanceOptimizableApprox.title: Query Performance Can Be Optimized
performanceOptimizableApprox.description: Query took approximately {{seconds}} seconds. Performance is acceptable but there's still room for optimization.

performanceExcellent.title: Excellent Query Performance
performanceExcellent.description: Query took only {{ms}} milliseconds, very fast response time, suitable for real-time query scenarios.

performanceSlowApprox.title: Slow Query Performance
performanceSlowApprox.description: Query took approximately {{seconds}} seconds. Consider adding time range limits, using indexes, or optimizing query conditions.

largeDataAggregation.title: Large Dataset Aggregation Suggestions
largeDataAggregation.description: Query returned {{rows}} rows. Consider using GROUP BY with time aggregation (e.g., by minute, hour) to reduce data volume and improve readability.

largeDataAggregationSimple.title: Large Dataset Aggregation Suggestions
largeDataAggregationSimple.description: Query returned {{rows}} rows. Consider using GROUP BY with time aggregation to reduce data volume.

largeDataset.title: Large Dataset
largeDataset.description: Query returned {{rows}} rows. Consider using time range limits or aggregation queries to improve performance.

largeDatasetSimple.title: Large Dataset
largeDatasetSimple.description: Query returned {{rows}} rows. Consider using time range limits or aggregation queries.

smallDataset.title: Small Dataset
smallDataset.description: Query only returned {{rows}} rows. You may need to check if the time range or query conditions are too restrictive.

smallDatasetSimple.title: Small Dataset
smallDatasetSimple.description: Query only returned {{rows}} rows. You may need to check the time range or query conditions.

highVariation.title: {{field}} High Value Variation
highVariation.description: Field {{field}} has a coefficient of variation of {{cv}}, with high value fluctuation ranging from {{min}} to {{max}}.

tooManyFields.title: Too Many Fields
tooManyFields.description: Query returned {{count}} fields. Consider selecting only the needed fields to improve query performance and readability.

categoricalFields.title: Categorical Fields Detected
categoricalFields.description: Fields {{fields}} have a low number of unique values (<10), suitable for grouping or categorization in aggregate analysis.

uniqueIdentifierFields.title: Unique Identifier Fields Detected
uniqueIdentifierFields.description: Fields {{fields}} have all unique values, possibly ID or timestamp fields.

significantTrendUp.title: {{field}} Significant Upward Trend
significantTrendUp.description: Field {{field}} increased by approximately {{percent}}% within the query time range, recommend paying attention to this significant change.

significantTrendDown.title: {{field}} Significant Downward Trend
significantTrendDown.description: Field {{field}} decreased by approximately {{percent}}% within the query time range, recommend paying attention to this significant change.

trendUp.title: {{field}} Upward Trend
trendUp.description: Field {{field}} increased by approximately {{percent}}% within the query time range.

trendDown.title: {{field}} Downward Trend
trendDown.description: Field {{field}} decreased by approximately {{percent}}% within the query time range.

outliers.title: {{field}} Has Outliers
outliers.description: Detected {{count}} anomalous data points (exceeding 3 standard deviations), accounting for {{percent}}%, recommend checking if data collection is normal.

executor.slowQuerySuggestion: Query is slow, consider adding time range limits or indexes
executor.goodPerformanceSuggestion: Performance is good, can consider further optimization
executor.largeDataSuggestion: Large dataset, consider using aggregate queries

highNullFields.title: Data Quality Issues
highNullFields.description: Fields {{fields}} contain over 50% null values, which may affect data analysis accuracy.
highNullFields.descriptionShort: Fields {{fields}} contain over 50% null values, may affect analysis accuracy.

mediumNullFields.title: Some Fields Have Null Values
mediumNullFields.description: Fields {{fields}} contain 20%-50% null values, recommend handling null values during analysis.
mediumNullFields.descriptionShort: Fields {{fields}} contain 20%-50% null values, recommend handling during analysis.

noNullFields.title: Good Data Completeness
noNullFields.description: All fields have no null values, data completeness is 100%, excellent data quality.

lowCardinality.title: Low Cardinality Fields Detected
lowCardinality.description: Fields {{fields}} have a low number of unique values (<10), suitable for grouping or categorization.

longTimeSpan.title: Long Time Span Data
longTimeSpan.description: Data time span is {{days}} days, recommend using time aggregation (GROUP BY time(1h) or time(1d)) to improve visualization.
longTimeSpan.descriptionShort: Data time span is {{days}} days, recommend using time aggregation (by hour or day) to improve visualization.

veryLongTimeSpan.title: Very Long Time Span Data
veryLongTimeSpan.description: Data time span exceeds {{years}} years, recommend using daily or weekly aggregation to improve visualization.

shortTimeSpan.title: Short Time Span Data
shortTimeSpan.description: Data time span is only {{minutes}} minutes, suitable for fine-grained real-time monitoring analysis.

highFrequencySampling.title: High Frequency Sampling Data
highFrequencySampling.description: Average sampling interval is approximately {{ms}} milliseconds, data collection frequency is very high, suitable for real-time monitoring scenarios.

secondLevelSampling.title: Second-Level Sampling Data
secondLevelSampling.description: Average sampling interval is approximately {{seconds}} seconds, moderate data density, suitable for short-term trend analysis.

minuteLevelSampling.title: Minute-Level Sampling Data
minuteLevelSampling.description: Average sampling interval is approximately {{minutes}} minutes, suitable for medium-term trend analysis.

hourLevelSampling.title: Hour-Level Sampling Data
hourLevelSampling.description: Average sampling interval is approximately {{hours}} hours, suitable for long-term trend analysis.

unevenSampling.title: Uneven Sampling Intervals
unevenSampling.description: Data sampling intervals vary significantly (coefficient of variation {{cv}}%), may indicate data loss or unstable collection.

manyZeros.title: {{field}} Contains Many Zero Values
manyZeros.description: Field {{field}} has {{percent}}% zero values, may need to check data collection or sensor status.

hasNegatives.title: {{field}} Has Negative Values
hasNegatives.description: Field {{field}} has {{count}} negative values ({{percent}}%), if this field should not be negative, please check data source.

constantField.title: {{field}} Is a Constant Field
constantField.description: Field {{field}} has all identical values ({{value}}), may not need to be included in query results.

trendAnalysis.title: {{field}} Significant {{direction}} Trend
trendAnalysis.description: Field {{field}} {{direction}} by approximately {{percent}}% within the query time range, recommend paying attention to this trend.

anomalyDetected.title: {{field}} Has Anomalies
anomalyDetected.description: Detected {{count}} anomalous data points (exceeding 3 standard deviations), recommend checking if data collection is normal.

deleteWarnings.noRowCount: DELETE operation does not return the specific number of deleted rows
deleteWarnings.verifyWithSelect: Recommend executing SELECT query to verify data deletion
deleteWarnings.irreversible: DELETE operation is irreversible, use with caution

dropWarnings.permanent: DROP operation permanently deletes data and cannot be recovered
dropWarnings.dataRemoved: The deleted object and all its data have been removed
dropWarnings.backupFirst: Please ensure data backup has been made

createTips.useShow: Use SHOW command to view created objects
createTips.mayFail: Some CREATE statements may fail if the object already exists

fieldStatistics.title: Field Statistics
fieldStatistics.noStats: No field statistics for this query
fieldStatistics.executeToView: Execute query to view field statistics
fieldStatistics.executeToPreview: Execute query to preview data sample

visualization.title: Data Visualization
visualization.noVisualization: Query result {{index}} has no visualization data
visualization.executeForChart: Execute query with time and numeric fields to generate chart

insights.title: Intelligent Data Insights
insights.executeForInsights: Intelligent analysis will be generated after query execution

writeOperations.canVerifyWithSelect: You can execute SELECT query to verify the written data
